custom_expected:
THEN we will see the bitrate adapt 
AND the video playback will adjust accordingly based on the connectivity of the wireless ad hoc network

title: (Archived OR Live) Verify Today's Games are displayed in correct order
custom_preconds:
User is logged in
Live or VOD game is streaming
custom_steps:
WHEN we observe the Today's Games UI 
AND scroll left and right through the game tiles
custom_expected:
THEN today's games will display (excluding the game you are currently watching) 
Default view- 
o Favorite team first followed by Following teams
o Games display in order of soonest start time 1st (live at front of list and Final games at end) After you switch games, the last game you were watching is pushed to the beginning to the list in order to make toggling between two games quicker. 

Note: If you are watching an archived from a previous day, that game is NOT added to the beginning of the list. The list will only ever contain today's games.

title: (Archived OR Live) Verify Game tile statuses update
custom_preconds: User is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN we stream a game (live or archived)
AND we observe the Games tiles in the Today's Games UI
custom_expected:
THEN the tiles will display game status in real time. 

Example: 
o Scheduled game displaying Start time, updates to display Warmup> Top 1st >...> Final 
o Game status updates within 90 seconds of play (balls, strikes, outs, on base, score, inning) 
o As  games transition from scheduled, to in progress, to final, the games status is reflected in real time in the game tile.

title: Favorite Team UI
custom_preconds: Clear the saved Favorite team
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app without save data.
2. Ensure that all expected results pass.
custom_expected:
* App launches and displays the Favorite Team page:
* The title of the page, **FAVORITE TEAM**, is centered at the top of the page
* 3 columns are displayed below the title: **American League**, <untitled>, **National League**
* The **American League** and **National League** columns contain 3 columns: **EAST**, **CENTRAL**, and **WEST**
* The center column contains the following Welcome text: Select your favorite team to personalize the MLB Home page. You can change your favorite team at any time in the Settings menu.
* Each of the division columns displays a team tile for the 5 teams in that division
* A team tile consists of the team logo with the team name below the logo; both the logo and the name are centered within the tile
* The team tiles for each division are arranged alphabetically from top to bottom
* A disabled **Next** button is displayed below the center column

Design: 
* Favorite Team page: https://zpl.io/Vk7YwX8
* Welcome text for center column: https://zpl.io/VKQGMGR

title: Navigate Favorite Team Page
custom_preconds: Clear the saved Favorite Team if it's been set previously
custom_steps:
1. Launch the app
2. Navigate to each of the 30 team tiles
custom_expected:
1. The app launches and lands on the Favorite Team page
2. As each team tile gains focus:
* The tile grows (and the previously highlighted tile shrinks back to normal size)
* The tile's background changes to the team's primary color
* The tile's border changes to the team's secondary color
* The center column shows info about the team (team wordmark, team name, team's stadium name, and team web site)

Design: 
* Favorite Team page: https://zpl.io/Vk7YwX8
* Examples of all team highlight colors: https://zpl.io/2GRp9Wm

title: Throttling of Network connection
custom_preconds:
Network emulator is setup according to:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/JTS/pages/4696660/Network+Emulator+Test+For+Connected+Devices. 
App is installed and user is logged in
custom_steps:
1. Start at 300Mbps and Stream an Archived or Live game for 10 minutes
2. Change to 3Mbps and Stream an Archived or Live game for 10 minutes
3. Change to 300Kbps and Stream an Archived or Live game for 10 minutes
custom_expected:
1. Full HD stream should play and be of high quality
2. Full HD stream should play and be of high quality
3. Game should stream at low quality; some buffering will be normal.  There should be no crashes.

title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify whether the Concurrency error message displays -> Happy path
custom_preconds:
1. User should Login with a valid account
2. Ensure that there are 5 devices logged in with the same account.
custom_steps:
1. Kick off the stream on max number of devices, in this case 4. (No need to wait a period of time between these launches.)
2. Wait a little over 2 minutes, 
3. kick off the stream on the test device.
custom_expected: Then the user should see the concurrency error message on the 5th device

title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify if the network disrupted then the other device should play the asset.
custom_preconds: 5 Devices are logged into the same account
custom_steps:
1. Kick off the stream on max number of devices, in this case 4. (No need to wait a period of time between these launches.)
2. Wait a little over 2 minutes
3. disconnect the network from one of the devices
4. wait 2 minutes
5. play the stream on the test device
custom_expected: Test devices should start the stream

title: Authenticated -> Concurrency -> Verify whether the Concurrency error message displays after relaunching the App
custom_preconds:
User should install latest At Bat store build on a mix of iOS and Android devices
User should Login with a valid account
Ensure that there are 7 devices logged in with the same account
Need up to 7 Chromecasts (use 2 or 3 minimum)
custom_steps:
1. Kick off the stream on max number of devices, in this case 4. (No need to wait a period of time between these launches.)
2. Wait a little over 2 minutes
3. Close the app and restart
5. play the stream on the test device
custom_expected: Test device should see the concurrency error message
